backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles and CRUD operations for offers with access control enforcement.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking footer‑related requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing layouts, pages, components, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH theme variables, light/dark palettes, and global element defaults.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file that loads the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, ThemeProvider, and page layout structure for the app.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Protects admin routes by checking identity and role, showing login or error states as needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button with loading, error handling, and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/cta/FloatingCont: Floating WhatsApp and phone call action buttons with tooltips and styled icons.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with store info, quick links, categories, and designer attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Provides the main header with navigation links, admin controls, login, and a responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Wraps pages with header, footer, and floating contact components.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Catego: Displays a category card with an image, title, and description.
Shows quick-access buttons for major product categories using icons.
frontend/src/components/marketing/TrustI: Renders trust indicator cards highlighting quality, pricing, and convenience.
frontend/src/components/marketing/WhyCho: Section listing key benefits of shopping at the store using icon cards.
frontend/src/components/media/Responsive: A wrapper for responsive images supporting priority loading and aspect ratios.
frontend/src/components/offers/OfferCard: Displays an offer with title, description, discount badge, and date range.
frontend/src/components/offers/OfferEdit: Dialog for creating or editing offers with validation and save handling.
frontend/src/components/seo/Seo.tsx: Manages SEO metadata and optional structured data injection.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useCallerRole.ts: Hook that checks whether the current actor has admin privileges.
frontend/src/hooks/offers/useActiveOffer: Hook for fetching active offers from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/offers/useAdminOffers: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating offer data through the actor, including create, update, delete, and toggle operations with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider to manage authentication, identity loading, login, and logout flows.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes, plus custom animations and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with SEO metadata, store story content, and values section using marketing components.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOffersPage: Provides an admin interface to create, edit, toggle, and delete promotional offers with dialogs and status handling.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Displays a category listing page with SEO metadata, hero section, category grid, and customer assistance info.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the store contact page with address, hours, phone, and an embedded Google Map along with SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage featuring a hero section, category links, trust indicators, and marketing sections with SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/OffersPage.tsx: Displays active offers with loading and error states, a hero banner, and promotional sections using fetched offer data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers to read, persist, and clear URL/query parameters using URLSearchParams and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and container settings using multiple plugins.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s state, requirements, features, and metadata for building the IN2 Supermart marketing website.
